Colophon


Updated 26 January 2020

Designed, developed, and maintained by Jonathan Dueck.

Code

Built on Jekyll and published through Siteleaf. Code written in Atom.

View the source on Github.

Typography

Text is set in Calluna by exljbris and Post Grotesk by Josh Finklea. Calluna is hosted by Typekit Adobe Fonts and Post Grotesk is self-hosted.
